name: ecaR|Race
description:
-Controls-

Player 1 - W,S,A,D || Player 2 - Up Arrow, Down Arrow, Left Arrow, Right Arrow

_____________________________________________________________

Are you ready to RACE?! If so you came to the right page!

You alone or with a friend can test your skills aginst cheating bots!

Remember to follow the road as if not, you might not get a full lap! The bots of course don't need that.

AND THERE IS MORE!

You can choose between 3 bad vehicles!

You can be any color you want!

You can only be black or gray!
